snippet: Talks over Iran’s nuclear program might be extended if disagreement over remaining issues cannot be resolved by a Nov. 24 deadline, Iran’s top negotiator was quoted as saying.
abstract: Abbas Araqchi, Iran's top negotiator, reports that talks over Iran’s nuclear program might be extended if disagreements over remaining issues cannot be resolved by Nov 24 deadline.
lead_paragraph: Talks over Iran’s nuclear program might be extended if disagreement over remaining issues cannot be resolved by a Nov. 24 deadline, Iran’s top negotiator was quoted as saying.

headline.main: Iran: Negotiator Hints at Extended Talks
headline.print_headline: Iran: Negotiator Hints at Extended Talks
